item.title: Roblox: Gone Hunting Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
If you've ever wanted to become a hunter, Gone Hunting is for you. Players will hunt various animals and catch unique fish. All of this will earn you a good amount of money. However, since high-stat gear is quite expensive, it will take a long time to earn enough. Luckily, Gone Hunting codes can make your life much easier.

These Roblox codes grant players valuable rewards. These include both cash and various boosters, which are especially useful for beginners.

All Gone Hunting Codes

Working Gone Hunting Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 250 Cash
  • GONEHUNTING - Redeem this code to get a 30-minute Luck Boost

Expired Gone Hunting Codes

There are no expired codes in Gone Hunting . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

Gone Hunting features a large open world filled with a variety of animals. Some can be caught using darts from a rifle, while others prefer a baited hook. Fortunately, players receive all the necessary tools within the first few minutes of the game. However, it's worth noting that their quality and stats are the lowest. Therefore, you'll be grinding a lot at first to earn money. However, there's a way to speed up this process: Gone Hunting codes.

Codes are an excellent source of free goodies from the developers. Most of them reward you with large sums of cash, so you won't want to miss out.

How to Redeem Gone Hunting Codes

Luckily, using codes in Gone Hunting is no different from most other similar Roblox games. Players only need a few clicks to get goodies. But if this is your first time playing, you can follow these steps:

  • Launch the Gone Hunting experience.
  • Next, open the Shop and go to the Codes tab.
  • Then, enter the code in the appropriate field. We recommend copying and pasting the codes instead of entering them manually. This will help avoid typos, as Roblox is case-sensitive.
  • Finally, click Redeem to receive your rewards.

How to Get More Gone Hunting Codes

To avoid missing out on new Gone Hunting codes, we recommend you check out this guide. We plan to update it as we do with our other Roblox codes articles. You should also visit the official developer pages, where you'll find all the game news, including upcoming events and updates firsthand:

  • Official Jallaby Wiggins Roblox Group
  • Official Gone Hunting X Page
  • Official Gone Hunting Discord Server

item.title: Roblox: Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Dig 1 Million Blocks challenges players to become true miners. You have a seemingly small plot of land at your disposal, but within its depths, you can find valuable ores and treasures. Therefore, players' main goal in this Roblox game is to dig as deep as possible. To speed up your progress, you should redeem Dig 1 Million Blocks codes.

As is typical with Roblox codes, each one contains valuable rewards from the developers. These include free Spins and large sums of Coins. However, you'll want to be quick to use them, as each code expires after a certain period of time, and the rewards become unavailable.

All Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes

Working Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes

  • KINGBOB - Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • SECRET - Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • PIZZAMARGHERITA - Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • OUTERSPACE - Redeem this code to get free rewards
  • launch - Redeem this code to get free rewards

Expired Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes

There are no expired codes in Dig 1 Million Blocks . We will update this article as soon as more code becomes available.

When playing Dig 1 Million Blocks , digging may seem pretty simple. However, this is only true when you're digging grass. Once you reach dirt and deeper levels, your shovel won't be enough. You can usually buy them with Coins, but of course, this is quite expensive. Therefore, we recommend using Dig 1 Million Blocks codes to earn extra cash.

Most codes contain Coins, so you only need to use a few to purchase new equipment and Pets. However, each code has a limited validity period, and if you don't hurry, it will expire.

How to Redeem Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes

The code redemption feature in Dig 1 Million Blocks works just as easily as in most other Roblox games. It's available from the very first minute of playing, so players can earn free goodies as soon as they join the experience. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • Launch Dig 1 Million Blocks .
  • Next, go to the Codes area in the spawn zone.
  • Then, enter the code in the window that opens.
  • Finally, click Submit to claim your reward.

How to Get More Dig 1 Million Blocks Codes

Now that you know how to use Roblox Dig 1 Million Blocks codes, you should learn how to get more codes. To do this, players can visit the developers' official social media pages. There you'll find all the news about the game and upcoming updates. Moreover, all promo codes appear there first:

  • Official Simple Bricks Dig Discord Server
  • Official Simple Bricks Dig Roblox Group
  • Official Simple Bricks Dig X Page

item.title: Idle Horizons Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Idle Horizons is a hero-collecting RPG with a lot of unique units. Each has different stats and abilities that will help you complete stages. However, initially, you'll struggle to acquire many characters. Luckily, there's a way to fix this: using Idle Horizons codes.

These codes will reward you with various free goodies from the developers. Furthermore, each code contains several rewards, including Summon Scrolls and Hero Shards, so you definitely won't want to miss out.

All Idle Horizons Codes

Working Idle Horizons Codes

  • FBC25 - Redeem this code to get 1000 Gems, 3 Challenge Tickets, 3 Arena Tickets, and 15 Summon Scrolls
  • TIKTOK25 - Redeem this code to get 1000 Gems, 3 Challenge Tickets, 3 Arena Tickets, and 15 Summon Scrolls
  • IGNISNOW - Redeem this code to get 20 IGNIS Hero Shards
  • PLEASE - Redeem this code to get 1000 Gems, 3 Challenge Tickets, 3 Arena Tickets, and 15 Summon Scrolls
  • GULLIBLE - Redeem this code to get 1000 Gems, 3 Challenge Tickets, 3 Arena Tickets, and 15 Summon Scrolls
  • JOINDISCORD - Redeem this code to get 500 Gems, 250K Gold, 10 Summon Scrolls, 3 Challenge Tickets, and 3 Arena Tickets

Expired Idle Horizons Codes

  • GCPOUTAGE0625
  • NEWYR2025
  • ARENASHOP00
  • LAG5PROMO
  • RC0225
  • SK02625

All battles in Idle Horizons take place without your participation. You simply select units and place them on the field to begin the battle. However, you'll still need to spend a significant amount of time finding the most effective teams. For this reason, you'll first need to summon as many characters as possible and then invest resources into them. Idle Horizons codes will help you with this.

Even a few codes are enough to summon over 30 units. Additionally, some of them can grant players unique Hero Shards, such as IGNIS. However, it's worth noting that codes have a limited validity period.

How to Redeem Idle Horizons Codes

Using Idle Horizons codes is no different from using codes in most other mobile RPG experiences. This feature is available to all players, although it does require one condition. For ease of use, follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Idle Horizons .
  • Next, progress in Story Mode until you unlock the Shop. After that, open the Shop and scroll down to select the Code option.
  • Then, enter the code in the field and press Enter to receive your free goodies.

How to Get More Idle Horizons Codes

To get the latest Idle Horizons codes firsthand, bookmark this guide. We'll update it as soon as new codes are released. You can also check out the developers' official pages for all the latest news about this mobile game:

  • Official Idle Horizons Discord Server
  • Official Idle Horizons Facebook Page

Idle Horizons is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Super Eleven Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
If you are a fan of soccer anime such as Inazuma Eleven , Captain Tsubasa , or Blue Lock , then Super Eleven is just for you. Here, you can equip various skills and play soccer against other players. Also, the game features a bunch of styles, which also diversify the gameplay. All of these you can get through the gacha system, for which spins are used.

Spins can be hard to farm, especially for beginners, and Robux is not something that fans want to use. Luckily, it is possible to use codes, which will give you various rewards, including precious spins. Therefore, below, we will list all the available Super Eleven codes.

All Super Eleven Codes

Working Super Eleven Codes

  • Upd1.6pt2 - redeem this code to get spins. (NEW)

Expired Super Eleven Codes

  • ladykirinbday!
  • patch2
  • balance
  • upd1.6pt1
  • 1MVisits
  • bugfix
  • rollback
  • nittadeletedfromgame
  • mball2
  • mball
  • upd1.5
  • exprework
  • sorrybug3
  • sorrybug2
  • sorrybug
  • SorryForShutdown
  • 1kccu
  • upd1.4
  • 9klikes
  • sorryforshutdown2
  • supertwitter
  • 4klikes
  • upd1.3
  • wallbug
  • 3klikes
  • 2klikes

Codes in Super Elven expire in a matter of hours, so it is essential to redeem them as soon as they are released. The best way to stay updated about all the new codes is to visit this guide, which we update as soon as something new is released.

How to Redeem Super Eleven Codes

The code redemption feature is really obvious in this Roblox experience, but some players may still experience trouble. For this reason, we’ve made a detailed guide explaining how to redeem codes and get your freebies. Follow the next steps:

  • Go to Roblox and launch Super Eleven .
  • If you spawn on the field, you should go to the lobby.
  • Look at the bottom of the screen. There, among many buttons, you will see the one saying “CODES.” Click on it.
  • Copy a code from the list above and paste it into the field.
  • Congratulations, the rewards are yours.

How to Get More Super Eleven Codes

The main reason developers regularly release new codes is to encourage players to follow their social media pages. Therefore, the best place to look for new promo codes is the official Discord server of the game. There, among the news and updates, you can find new Roblox codes.

item.title: Toys R Us Is Making a Comeback
item.description:
Toys R Us is continuing its comeback with ten new store locations and twice as many seasonal holiday shops, all of which are planned to open before the end of 2025. The move will see the company accelerate its return to brick and mortar.

Toys R Us filed for bankruptcy in September 2017, five months following its 69th anniversary. After liquidation proceedings began, brand management firm WHP Global took control in 2021. Four years later, WHP now partners with Go! Retail Group to run new U.S. flagship stores. Today's Toys R Us footprint includes major stores at Mall of America and American Dream, as well as shops inside every Macy's and a physical presence at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport.

Toys R Us Announces 10 New Flagship Stores, 20 Holiday Shops

Continuing this comeback tour, the group just announced plans to open 10 new Toys R Us flagship stores, in addition to 20 seasonal shops. The latter are essential pop-ups which will only be in business for the duration of the upcoming holiday season. Both the ephemeral shops and permanent stores are on track to open in the coming weeks. Seven locations have so far been confirmed for the flagships, including three California sites in Emeryville, Camarillo, and Long Beach. WHP Global has also greenlit stores in Thornton, Colorado and Hanover, Maryland, as well as Omaha, Nebraska and West Des Moines, Iowa.

In total, the American company confirmed seven fresh locations, with several more still to be announced. The new Toys R Us stateside stores will mostly be located in malls and outlet centers. The expansion follows the opening of a 13,000-square-foot flagship store on September 20 in Aurora, Illinois. That location marks the brand's second Chicago-area site after Norridge. As is typical for flagships, the store includes a Babies R Us section and an arcade area, a combo that underscores the updated, family-focused pitch of the Toys R Us comeback format.

Toys R Us originally filed for bankruptcy following years of declining sales, mounting debt, and intensifying competition from (largely online) rivals. Once its efforts to modernize failed to produce results, its debt-heavy balance sheet, saddled with over $5 billion in obligations from a 2005 leveraged buyout, ended up breaking, pushing the company into insolvency and leading to hundreds of Toys R Us locations closing.

New Toys R Us Locations

  • Emeryville, California
  • Camarillo, California
  • Long Beach, California
  • Thornton, Colorado
  • Hanover, Maryland
  • Omaha, Nebraska
  • West Des Moines, Iowa
  • Aurora, Illinois

Informed by that experience, the brand's comeback has been focused on cost-effectiveness and highly targeted expansion. The newly announced holiday shops are emblematic of that strategy, generating revenue during the most lucrative retail period of the year without a fixed-cost profile.
